Alumni


PhD Students

  1. Anusree Rajan, PhD in EE, 2018 - 2023.
    • Thesis: Resource-Aware State-Triggered Networked Control Systems
    • After this joined Ericsson Research as a research intern. Then, joined as a postdoc in our group at IISc.

Postdocs

  1. Anusree Rajan, 2024 - 2025.
    • After this joined as Assistant Professor at Christ University, Bengaluru.
  2. Abhijit Mazumdar (from IIT Guwahati), 2021 - 2022.
    • After this joined as a Postdoc at Alborg University

MTech Students

  1. Dinesh T, MTech in Robotics and Autonomous Systems, 2023 - 2025.
    • After this joined as an Engineer at Mathworks.
  2. Aravind S, MTech in Robotics and Autonomous Systems, 2022 - 2024.
    • After this joined as an Engineer at Mathworks.
  3. Nirabhra Mandal, MTech (Res), EE, 2018 - 2021.
    • Thesis: Dynamics of a stratified population of optimum seeking agents on a network
    • After this joined as a PhD student at UC San Diego.
    • Awarded “The Hay Medal” for his MTech (Res) thesis.
  4. Subhajit Goswami, MTech (Res), EE, 2017- 2020.
    • Thesis: One-Shot Coordination of First and Last Mode Service in Multi-Modal Transportation
    • After this worked as a Project Associate at IISc and then joined Publicis Sapient. Now Data Scientist at Asian Paints.
  5. Vipul Kumar Sharma, MTech (Course), EE, 2017 - 2019.
    • After this joined Siemens. Now a PhD student at Purdue University.
